Articles.Content:
I'm considering installing the Scatterer addon, but need to know if it will adversely affect the in game loading speed on my Mac. Will it?

Edited December 3, 2018 by Zosma Procyon

Adding any mod will increase loading times.  How much will depend heavily on your specific hardware, not because it's a Mac.

Why not just install it and see what happens?  If you don't like it you can always just remove it.

I have Scatterer installed on my mac and it makes negligible difference to the load times. Weirdly, I have the same set-up (same mods, same release) installed on bootcamp windows 10 on the same machine, and Kerbal takes about 5x as long to load on that.
